about_the_game:
He has awoken, join the Cyber-Assassin in this early access demo in an epic experience that combines hack and slash with third person shooter. All set in a futuristic, sci fi earth with metal structures and neon lights.

The Ultimate Killing Machine

CYBER-ASSASSIN™ gives the player an epic experience of third person shooter combat and hacking and slashing with two swords.
Perform various sword combos and attacks to even the odds up close, and use your pistols to take care of enemies from a farther range.

content_descriptors.notes: CYBER-ASSASSIN™ will contain Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, and Strong Language.

detailed_description:
He has awoken, join the Cyber-Assassin in this early access demo in an epic experience that combines hack and slash with third person shooter. All set in a futuristic, sci fi earth with metal structures and neon lights.

The Ultimate Killing Machine

CYBER-ASSASSIN™ gives the player an epic experience of third person shooter combat and hacking and slashing with two swords.
Perform various sword combos and attacks to even the odds up close, and use your pistols to take care of enemies from a farther range.
name: CYBER-ASSASSIN™ Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7 / 64-Bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.3 GHz or better, or AMD Ryzen 3 @ 3.1 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (6GB), NVIDIA GeForce 970 (4GB), AMD RX 480 (8GB)
  • Storage: 751 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-Bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or better, or AMD Ryzen 7 1800X or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (6GB), NVIDIA GeForce 970 (4GB), AMD RX 480 (8GB)
  • Storage: 760 MB available space
